lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission said Mr. Cooperman used inside information to buy Atlas Pipeline Partners stock before an asset sale.

headline.print_headline: Fund Giant Accused of Insider Trading
headline.main: Leon Cooperman, a Billionaire Charged With Insider Trading, Prepares to Fight

snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission said Mr. Cooperman used inside information to buy Atlas Pipeline Partners stock before an asset sale....
abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission sues Leon G Cooperman, accusing his hedge fund company Omega Advisors of gaining $4 million in illegal earnings by using nonpublic information about 2010 energy deal; complaint puts gruff, outspoken billionaire in cross hairs of insider information case.
